AI Description: SRA Toolkit is a collection of tools and libraries for accessing the Sequence Read Archive (SRA) and related genomic data formats. It provides command-line utilities for downloading, browsing, and converting high-throughput sequencing data stored in the SRA database maintained by the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI).
Core Features: Download High-Throughput Sequencing Data From The Sra Database, Convert Data Between Different File Formats (E.G., Sra To Fastq), Query Metadata & Access Sequence Read Data Efficiently, Integrate Easily Into Bioinformatics Pipelines
General Tags: Bioinformatics, High-Throughput Sequencing, Genomic Data, Data Conversion, Sequence Analysis
